Title: Les jeux sont faits
Writer: Jean-Paul Sartre (original scenario), Jean-Paul Sartre (dialogue), Jacques-Laurent Bost (dialogue), Jean Delannoy (adaptation)
Actors: Micheline Presle, Marcello Pagliero, Marguerite Moreno, Charles Dullin
Plot: Two people learn to love each other in the afterlife and get a second chance.
